title: UNABLE TO LOGIN
body: Am i the only one (including 10 other people) that cant login after the sudden crash. Has happened for about 30 mins

replies.body:
Sorry for the late response- it seems like there were login issues around this time, which were subsequently addressed in this post:

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1EiLQpcO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-28T01:06:11.786+0000)
>
> Hi everyone, we've reverted a change that may have caused this and it is looking like you should be able to log in again now. Still trying to gather more info about why this change caused this issue for some players. OCE was not the only region impacted.

If you encounter login issues in the future, 

* Check out the [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page
* If there is no login service downtime, try the solutions in the [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) Riot Support article

Thanks for the report, and sorry again for the late reply.
I can login but very soon after it'll say I've disconnected and go to trying to reconnect. All I can do is exit and try to login again, but often it'll just fail to login.
